mean_en: an occurrence that involves the production of a union
word_etyma: uni一个，单一+fic做+ation名词后缀→unification联合
sentence: We are pushing for the unification of all of our subsidiaries into a single company.
sentence_trans: 我们正奋力争取所有子公司统一成单个公司。
sentence_phrase: the unification of all of our subsidiaries
